## CORE Governance Change Checklist (Required)

- [ ] This change does NOT violate CORE_STOP_LAYER
- [ ] This change preserves Git-locked authority
- [ ] No new profiling, targeting, or identity sorting
- [ ] No hidden telemetry / tracking paths introduced
- [ ] Admin power remains logged, auditable, revocable
- [ ] Cross-references updated in CORE_GOVERNANCE_INDEX_CHAIN_OF_AUTHORITY.md
- [ ] If this touches a vertical, the vertical governance file was updated
- [ ] I confirm this is a lawful change under CORE_PLATFORM_CONSTITUTION.md

### Summary
(What changed and why)
